Articles.Content:
issue: https://youtu.be/rGAQy2O46wQ

as you can see only the top set of docking ports can be undocked, the set below have the option to be undocked but when i click it nothing happens, the rest don't even have the option to be undocked. the module that can be undocked is the one that was added most recently. also once i click on undock with one of the docking ports that is broken the button to undock goes away and doesn't come back, this is what happened with the ones that don't even have the ability to be undocked.

mods: https://imgur.com/a/R9ji0kj

log? (this is just the document labeled KSP.log https://imgur.com/a/qXMRvm4 ) : https://github.com/ZZetho/stuff

It's on github because the ksp forum didn't like me copy and pasting it into here.

https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/4uw89q/how_to_unstick_a_stuck_docking_port/

This is a known issue that happens sometimes that link will show you how to edit your save file to fix it.
